column4: silly problem: I have a directory under subversion control, then upgraded from 8.04 to 9.04, had to downgrade because of issues and now I can't use subversion in 8.04 on that dir any more, because it complains that the svn client is too old. apt-get says, subversion is the newest version.
load a binary package of subversion from subversion.tigris.org
you may delete it later, if you're going to upgrade
there aren't any, just a link to packages.ubuntu.com
